 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺלֶ֫דֶת‎</span> **noun feminine** ==kindred, birth, offspring==; — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> construct [[Lev.18.9|Lev 18:9]]; [[Lev.18.11|Lev 18:11]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺלַדְתִּי‎</span> [[Gen.24.4|Gen 24:4]] + 3 t.; etc.; plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺלְדוֺתַיִךְ‎</span> [[Ezek.16.4|Ezek 16:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֹלְדֹתַיִךְ‎</span> v[[Ezek.16.3|Ezek 16:3]] — 

**1.** ***kindred*** [[Gen.12.1|Gen 12:1]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ארצך‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בית אביך‎</span>), [[Gen.24.4|Gen 24:4]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ארץ‎</span>), [[Num.10.30|Num 10:30]] (\|\| ***id.***), [[Gen.31.3|Gen 31:3]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ארץ אבותיך‎</span>), [[Gen.43.7|Gen 43:7]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]); \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַם‎</span> [[Esth.2.10|Esth 2:10]]; [[Esth.2.20|Esth 2:20]]; [[Esth.8.6|Esth 8:6]] especially <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶרֶץ מ‎</span> ***land of one's kindred*** [[Gen.11.28|Gen 11:28]]; [[Gen.24.7|Gen 24:7]] (both [[BDB#J|J]]), [[Gen.31.13|Gen 31:13]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Jer.22.10|Jer 22:10]]; [[Jer.46.16|Jer 46:16]]; [[Ezek.23.15|Ezek 23:15]]; [[Ruth.2.11|Ruth 2:11]]. 

**2.** plural ***circumstances of birth, birth*** (figurative of origin of Jerusalem) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵאֶרֶץ הַכְּנַעֲנִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְכֹרֹתַיִךְ וּמ‎</span> [[Ezek.16.3|Ezek 16:3]], compare v[[Ezek.16.4|Ezek 16:4]]. 

**3.** (female) ***offspring, one born*** [[Lev.18.9|Lev 18:9]] (twice in verse), ***begotten*** v[[Lev.18.11|Lev 18:11]] (all [[BDB#H|H]]); collective = ***issue, offspring*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺלַדְתְּךָ אֲשֶׁר הוֺלַ֫דְתָּ‎</span> [[Gen.48.6|Gen 48:6]] ([[BDB#P|P]]). 



 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַגָּל‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==sickle== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (yet possibly Aramaic loan-word [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>133</sup>), Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּפַשׂ‎</span> ***handle, wield*** [[Jer.50.16|Jer 50:16]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זָרַע‎</span>); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁלַח‎</span> [[Joel.4.13|Joel 4:13]] figurative of judgement.
